body.p:
The undersigned citizens of Powell County Ky would respectfully represent to the Hon Beriah Magoffin Govenor of Ky. That at the late March term of the Powell circuit court Wm H Forman a young man of about twenty years of age was fined fifty dollars for carrying a pistol Mr Forman & his family are poor and unable in these times to pay the fine without depriving them of bread & Mr Forman is now a reformed man & we ask your excellency to remit his fine
June 3d 1861
